foods.title: Hamburger
foods.description: A classic hamburger made with a juicy beef patty, fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and cheese, served on a toasted bun.

foods.title: Pizza
foods.description: A delicious pizza topped with marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, and peppers, baked to perfection.

foods.title: Sushi
foods.description: Fresh sushi rolls made with premium sushi rice, seaweed, fresh fish, avocado, and cucumber, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

foods.title: Taco
foods.description: Authentic tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream, served in soft corn tortillas.

foods.title: Pad Thai
foods.description: A classic Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

foods.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
foods.description: A refreshing salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

foods.title: Steak
foods.description: A juicy steak grilled to perfection, served with mashed potatoes, steamed vegetables, and a savory steak sauce.

foods.title: Pasta Carbonara
foods.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper, topped with parsley.

foods.title: Fish and Chips
foods.description: Crispy battered fish served with golden brown fries, tartar sauce, and malt vinegar.

foods.title: Pho
foods.description: A traditional Vietnamese noodle soup made with beef or chicken broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat slices.

foods.title: BBQ Ribs
foods.description: Tender pork ribs slow-cooked and basted in barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw and baked beans.

foods.title: Curry Chicken
foods.description: A flavorful Indian curry made with tender chicken pieces, onions, tomatoes, coconut milk, and a blend of spices.
